data.title: Brown University Athletics
data.meta_description: Nicholas Codrea (75) OL - Junior: Played all 10 games as a member of the offensive line… Sophomore: A member of the travel squad…Saw action in ...
data.text: Junior: Played all 10 games as a member of the offensive line…Sophomore: A member of the travel squad…Saw action in the Bears’ win over Cornell...Freshman: Gained valuable experience playing for the Bears’ undefeated Junior Varsity team… Secondary School Background: A graduate of St. Vincent-St. Mary High School where he lettered in football… Named Team Offensive Lineman of the Year for 2009 and 2010 as well as the 2010 Greater Akron Area Touchdown Club All-Star Athlete… All Ohio Division 3 Honorable Mention for 2010… Named to the 2010 All-Northeastern Inland District Division 3 First Team… Selected for the 2010 Summit County All-Star West Team… Member and President of the National Honor Society… Senior Class Vice President… Member of the Honor Roll for all 8 semesters… Personal: Nicholas M. Codrea, son of Robert and Sara Codrea, has a younger brother, Zachary, a 2-time state football champion in Ohio… Enjoys watching movies and playing darts… Business Economics and European History concentrator.
